item.title: Ready, Set, Code
item.description: 36 Amazing Python Open Source Projects (v.2019) Posted: April 22, 2019 How the heck does async/await work in Python 3.5? Posted: April 22, 2019 Curio - A Tutorial Introduction Posted: April 21, 2019 All: "Ready Set Code" Posts

item.title: musings
item.description: Read more Social Trust Game By wocos on May 16, 2019 This is a very interesting game dealing with social trust, benfits of cooperation, damge of miscommunication, cheating etc. This helps us to understand why in the middle of WWI soldiers from both side stopped fighting on Christmas day… Try this game. If you are like me, you will get sucked in just to find out what the final conclusions are… only takes a few minutes of your valuable time: https://ncase.
